Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Tjanhebu,overseer of ships of the king son of Tanefretiyti with a lappet-wig, a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the cord of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the lower body is inscribed with ten rows of hieroglyphic text; back-pillar.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
